rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现阿拉巴马州农村地区儿童肠道病原体含量高，凸显卫生问题该研究揭示了阿拉巴马州黑带地区儿童体内大量存在肠道病原体，这将井水消耗与病原体检测的增加联系起来，并强调了改善卫生基础设施的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Study-finds-high-levels-of-enteric-pathogens-in-children-from-Alabamas-rural-areas-highlights-sanitation-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Study-finds-high-levels-of-enteric-pathogens-in-children-from-Alabamas-rural-areas-highlights-sanitation-issues.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cb71175-7ad8-4fcc-a3e6-3269183ecde2 Sun, 19 Nov 2023 21:23:00 -0500 Study finds high levels of enteric pathogens in children from Alabama's rural areas, highlights sanitation issues
鸽子病毒导致年轻白血病患者致命的神经系统疾病一份病例报告详细介绍了由鸽禽副粘病毒引起的免疫功能低下幼儿的致命神经系统疾病，强调了宏基因组测试在诊断复杂传染病方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Pigeon-virus-causes-fatal-neurological-disease-in-young-leukemia-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Pigeon-virus-causes-fatal-neurological-disease-in-young-leukemia-patent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6813180-565b-4fca-a735-bb97bfa9183c Sun, 19 Nov 2023 20:57:00 -0500 Pigeon virus causes fatal neurological disease in young leukemia patient
突破性的无线传感器提供持续的健康监测，彻底改变患者护理该研究引入了一种无线宽带声机械传感（BAMS）系统，用于连续生理监测，捕获广泛的身体信号，并为家庭和医院环境提供巨大的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Breakthrough-wireless-sensor-offers-continuous-health-monitoring-revolutionizing-病人-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Breakthrough-wireless-sensor-offers-continuous-health-monitoring-revolutionizing-病人-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5820f766-d346-4d1c-b1cc-fe65d31238ef Sun, 19 Nov 2023 20:42:00 -0500 Breakthrough wireless sensor offers continuous health monitoring, revolutionizing patient care
欧盟抗生素使用量反弹至大流行前水平，挑战 2030 年减少目标该研究显示，欧盟/欧洲经济区的抗生素使用量在大流行后出现反弹，到 2022 年将恢复到新冠疫情前的水平，这凸显了采取有针对性的干预措施以实现到 2030 年抗生素减少目标的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Antibiotic-use-in-EU-rebounds-to-pre-pandemic-levels-challenges-2030-reduction-goal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Antibiotic-use-in-EU-rebounds-to-pre-pandemic-levels-challenges-2030-reduction-goal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97f78fac-218f-4c25-bdb3-401c0b033dd0 Sun, 19 Nov 2023 20:28:00 -0500 Antibiotic use in EU rebounds to pre-pandemic levels, challenges 2030 reduction goal
研究揭示了巴西非糖尿病成年人使用人造甜味剂的惊人趋势该研究调查了巴西非糖尿病成年人中非营养性甜味剂 (NNS) 的广泛使用情况，结果表明，高等教育、收入和体重指数增加了定期食用 NNS 的可能性，挑战了 NNS 作为健康替代品的看法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Study-reveals-surprising-trends-in-non-diabetic-adults-use-of-artificial-sweeteners-in-Brazil.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Study-reveals-surprising-trends-in-non-diabetic-adults-use-of-artificial-sweeteners-in-Brazil.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b93b1c15-39ab-483f-a7e0-d5fb61f34dee Sun, 19 Nov 2023 19:36:00 -0500 Study reveals surprising trends in non-diabetic adults' use of artificial sweeteners in Brazil
重大研究发现，英国国家卫生服务糖尿病计划在管理糖尿病前期方面被证明是有效的研究人员检查了英国实施的 NHS 糖尿病预防计划 (DPP) 的原始框架。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/UKs-national-health-service-diabetes-program-proves- effective-in-managing-prediabetes-major-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/UKs-national-health-service-diabetes-program-proves- effective-in-managing-prediabetes-major-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b12dc55-e59c-4ebd-8297-0ce646e73b21 Sun, 19 Nov 2023 19:28:00 -0500 UK's national health service diabetes program proves effective in managing prediabetes, major study finds
研究人员开发基于机器学习的肩部功能评估工具发表在《科学报告》上的一项研究介绍了一种简单的拉绳任务，作为评估动物和人类肩部活动能力的可靠方法。这种创新方法与机器学习相结合，有可能彻底改变肩部损伤的诊断和监测，提供负担​​得起且易于使用的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Researchers-develop-machine-learning-based-tool-for-assessment-of-shoulder-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231119/Researchers-develop-machine-learning-based-tool-for-assessment-of-shoulder-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eaa998e4-6948-436e-99d4-fb406e4716b2 Sun, 19 Nov 2023 19:19:00 -0500 Researchers develop machine learning-based tool for assessment of shoulder function
机器学习发现了用于疫苗和免疫治疗的有效免疫调节剂称为免疫调节剂的小分子可以帮助创造更有效的疫苗和更强的免疫疗法来治疗癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Machine-learning-uncovers-pot-immunomodulators-for-vaccines-and-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Machine-learning-uncovers-pot-immunomodulators-for-vaccines-and-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5def86d-e30d-410c-8b94-240d0e0b4f15 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:59:00 -0500 Machine learning uncovers potent immunomodulators for vaccines and immunotherapy
干细胞衍生的脑细胞有望治疗阿尔茨海默氏症和帕金森氏症威斯康星大学麦迪逊分校的研究人员发现了一种对一种脑细胞发育至关重要的蛋白质，这种脑细胞被认为在阿尔茨海默病和帕金森病等疾病中发挥着作用，并首次利用这一发现从干细胞中培养出神经元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Stem-cell-driven-brain-cells-hold-promise-for-Alzheimers-Parkinsons-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Stem-cell-driven-brain-cells-hold-promise-for-Alzheimers-Parkinsons-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31c5036d-b162-40f3-8a75-2cccdeec734c Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:54:59 -0500 Stem-cell-derived brain cells hold promise for Alzheimer's, Parkinson's research
欧洲抗生素消费量反弹至大流行前水平今年的欧洲抗生素宣传日 (EAAD) 重点关注 2023 年理事会建议中概述的目标，以加强欧盟 (EU) 采取“同一个健康”方法应对抗菌素耐药性的努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Antibiotic-conspiration-in-Europe-rebounds-to-pre-pandemic-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Antibiotic-conspiration-in-Europe-rebounds-to-pre-pandemic-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22965af1-a8b8-435d-bb90-9f5fb3d89d56 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:44:14 -0500 Antibiotic consumption in Europe rebounds to pre-pandemic levels
